what story?: They discovered the Master Key for decrypting HD-DVD.  It's a number.  It's 09-f9-11-02-9d-74-e3-5b-d8-41-56-c5-63.
So, then the MPAA tells web sites: you can't say 09-f9-11-02-9d-74-e3-5b-d8-41-56-c5-63 on your web site!  We will issue a DMCA takedown notice!  So then the site went down.
But the geek community was so incensed with MPAA for saying that the number is copyrighted, so now they're posting the number all over the place.
